name: Massimo Bottura
short_bio: Massimo Bottura is an Italian restaurateur and the chef patron of Osteria Francescana, a three-Michelin-star restaurant based in Modena, Italy.

name: Gualtiero Marchesi
short_bio: Gualtiero Marchesi was an Italian chef and restaurateur, considered to be the founder of modern Italian cuisine.

name: Lidia Bastianich
short_bio: Lidia Bastianich is an Italian-American celebrity chef, television host, author, and restaurateur.

name: Carlo Cracco
short_bio: Carlo Cracco is an Italian chef and television personality, known for his role as a judge on the Italian version of MasterChef.

name: Davide Oldani
short_bio: Davide Oldani is an Italian chef and restaurateur, known for his innovative approach to traditional Italian cuisine.

name: Enrico Crippa
short_bio: Enrico Crippa is an Italian chef and the owner of Piazza Duomo, a three-Michelin-star restaurant located in Alba, Italy.
